page.title: 04FIRST HOLY COMMUNION DAY (2)
page.content: Then my sponsor, my uncle, came up from Batley. He was doing the Sunday People crossword. We arrived at church at 10.35 a.m. There were lots of girls and boys looking very smart in their dresses and suits. {RICHARD KOSMALI aged 10. {} May the 20th. MY NEWS. On Sunday I made my first Holy Communion and not only that but I read a bidding prayer also. We did some singing and said our prayers. When Mass had finished we had photographs taken by the photographer then my daddy and grandad took a photo of me by myself. Then we went into the hall and had our breakfast. I went to my nanna and she gave me a bracelet then we went home. {SARAH BIRDSALL aged 7. { HOLY SPIRIT R.C. PRIMARY SCHOOL { HECKMONDWIKE
